title: [PBE 25/03] Omega Squad Teemo, Changes to Tristana and Cinderhulk Enchantment, Guardian of the Sands

embed.description: Home > LoL News, PBE News > (WiP) [PBE 25/03] Omega Squad Teemo, Changes to Tristana and Cinderhulk Enchantment Work-in-progress! PBE 25/03 Omega Squad Teemo Champion Changes [ Remin der ] The PBE is a testing ground for changes. What you see here may not reflect what you see in Patch Notes.

replies.body:
I like the new Xearth skin.
Glad they've branched out from the recolourings to particle effects for him.

Guardian of the Sands Rammus should cover the whole map with a blinding sandstorm whenever he ults.
Darude - Sandstorm

Also Shadow Prince Malzahar rework pweeeaaassee
yeh... a new Teemo skin, thank god he was lacking in them. Only has like 14.
And here we got Zac... 1 skin {{item:3070}}
They will nerf Zac and then release a skin.

Don't remind me about Teemo skins. I have a smurf that I did some mystery gifting too. I mystery gifted 3 champions and 3 skins. I got Teemo out of one of the champions. Then I gifted 3 consecutive Teemo skins...I had 17 champions owned on this account. Yet 3 consecutive Teemo skins. To this day I still have not used them.
